title: Crime Alert 06.04.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.04.19
description:
Dad allegedly starves, beats and locks his 7-year-old son in an animal carrier, then encases his corpse in concrete. NBA referee drives drunk, crashes his orange jeep then tried to blame a “chick” who hit him. A 600 pound cocaine dealer receives his sentence from the back of an ambulance after not being able to be moved into the building.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
